story:
First Meeting 
 
 The moment that I realized we had an attraction was the most exciting and unexpected of my life. It happened so quickly in a bar after work at six o'clock on Friday night. My heart beat faster as he came over to me from across the room with eyes down; there was no chance for small talk between us because our gazes were locked together like two pieces of magnetized metal holding fast against each other until another hand pulled them apart briefly by way of introduction before they resumed their face-to-face connection. 
 Chemistry seemed instant when it should have taken time to begin forming through conversations, and this conversation was just right: bonding  
 We shared same thoughts & beliefs but did not agree;   
 There are few people who share all views equally!     
 This understanding helped overcome any initial barriers or misunderstandings during those early days. And now here am I waiting eagerly - hopefully without fear- tomorrow morning at eight-thirty ( 8 : thirty ) for his arrival. After spending only one week together yet already feeling more connected than friends who have been together for years and about to be married! What does the future hold? Will things progress smoothly towards marriage while others break up due to disagreements which will inevitably arise?! 
 
 Second Encounter 
 
 A second day has come... Do you remember what happened then? Did your feelings develop into love? Isn't every girl supposed to fall instantly in love upon first sight? But alas mine grew deeper by leaps and bounds much longer afterwards.. During lunch breaks, instead of eating our food we talked away almost non-stop. As soon as we looked beyond our meal we started talking about important issues in our lives such as school, college, family etc., All these subjects gave rise to interesting discussions which led eventually to even more discussions. Our interests in certain topics kept growing till my mind became blank of anything else except him. By Sunday afternoon both parties agreed enough to tell everyone the news, thus officially launching my romance. Thus began an adventure which has spanned
outline: encounter, attraction, first meeting | chemistry, conversation, bonding | misunderstanding, conflict, barrier | truth, feelings, vulnerable | love, commitment, future
